description: The encased fan has many different uses, it can be used to blast, wash, haunt and smoke items. The rotation will mean it either pushes or pulls air
To /4/blast/4/ items you need to put a lava source infront of the fan
To /3/wash/3/ items you need to put a water source infront of the fan
To /b/haunt/b/ items you need to put a soul campfire infront of the fan
To /6/smoke/6/ items you need to put a campire infront of the fan
